notes.reading-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON READING PASSAGE
TOPIC: article in campus newspaper about incident at football game
details of incident in newspaper article:
large number of spectators ran onto field for no reason; a lot of shoving
person got hurt in scuffle; police called to break up scuffle
ambulance took seriously injured person to hospital
notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON LISTENING PASSAGE
TOPIC: man's disagreement with details of incident
details of incident according to man (who was at game):
only two people (player's parents) and they had reason (son was hurt); there was no shoving
son was hurt in game; no police called
parents took son home because he was not seriously injured (was in class this morning)
